listeningQuestion.question: What was the problem between the writer and the porter?
listeningQuestion.translation: 作者和搬运工之间存在什么问题？

content.editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个外国人在英国火车站与搬运工交流时遇到的语言障碍，重点介绍了railway、porter、several等词的用法，以及英语中表示'到达'的多种表达方式。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: I arrived in London at last.
The railway station was big, black and dark.
I did not know the way to my hotel, so I asked a porter.
I not only spoke English very carefully, but very clearly as well.
The porter, however, could not understand me.
I repeated my question several times and at last he understood.
He answered me, but he spoke neither slowly nor clearly.
Then he spoke slowly, but I could not understand him.
My teacher never spoke English like that!
The porter and I looked at each other and smiled.
Then he said something and I understood it.
In England, each person speaks a different language.
The English understand each other, but I don't understand them!

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 我不知道去饭店的路该怎么走，于是向一个搬运工打听。
我的英语讲得不但非常认真，而且咬字也非常清楚。
然而搬运工却不明白我的话。
我把问话重复了很多遍。他终于听懂了。
他回答了，但他讲得既不慢也不清楚。
于是他说得慢了，可我还是听不懂。
我的老师从来不那样讲英语！
接着，他说了点什么，这回我听懂了。
在英国，人们各自说着一种不同的语言。
英国人之间相互听得懂，可我却不懂他们的话！

newwords.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

additionalInfo: porter - 搬运工，行李搬运工

notes.toggle: quantifier 几个（只能修饰可数名词）
additionalInfo: several = a number of... - 一些（只能修饰可数）
some - 一些（可修饰可数和不可数）
wonder + if + 从句 - 是否……
wonder + 特殊疑问词 + 从句
I wonder what time it is.

notes.title: 表示'到达'的多种表达
content: 1. arrive in/at - arrive in用于大地点，arrive at用于小地点
2. reach + 宾语 - 到达……（必须加宾语）
3. get to + 宾语 - 到达……
4. get home/there - home/there作副词时，不需要加介词

notes.title: not only...but...as well
content: 1. 等同于not only...but also... - 不但……而且……
2. not only通常放在动词前面
3. 例句：I can not only speak Chinese but English as well.

notes.title: neither...nor...
content: 2. 谓语动词与nor后面的词保持一致（就近原则）
3. 例句：He spoke neither slowly nor clearly.

notes.context: 表示经过长时间等待后终于发生
notes.example: I arrived in London at last.

notes.context: 询问或指示方向时使用
notes.example: I did not know the way to my hotel.
My teacher never spoke English like that!

notes.context: 表示两人或多人之间的互视
notes.example: The porter and I looked at each other and smiled.

multipleChoice.question: Why couldn't the porter understand the writer at first?
options: They spoke different kinds of English
multipleChoice.explanation: 从文中可以看出，虽然作者说得很认真清楚，但由于英国人说的英语与他学的不同，所以双方都听不懂对方的话。

multipleChoice.question: What does 'I wonder' mean in this context?
multipleChoice.explanation: 这里的'I wonder'表示作者对porter说的'You'll soon learn English!'这句话持怀疑态度。

fillInBlanks.sentence: The writer spoke English very _____ and clearly.

notes.title: 英语中的'English'用法
notes.content: 1. the English - 英国人（作名词，指群体）；2. English - 英语（语言名称，不加冠词）；3. English - 英国的（作形容词）

notes.title: 地址和日期的写法
notes.content: 1. 地址中逗号表示前者属于后者；2. 日期中月和日可互换，年份前要加逗号；3. 日期要用序数词；4. 月份必须用英语字母
